sentences.english: At Blackburn I used to just get the ball and run at people, head down.
sentences.chinese: 在布莱克本我习惯于得球后朝人冲过去，然后被放倒。

sentences.english: They were having a laugh and watching the Stoke v Blackburn game.
sentences.chinese: 他们有说有笑，一边看着斯托克城和布莱克本的比赛。

sentences.english: By Richard Clarke Emmanuel Eboue will miss the Premiership game with Blackburn on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 埃布将会错过周日英超对布莱克本的比赛。

sentences.english: Blackburn received the news in a 2am phone call.
sentences.chinese: 布莱克本在凌晨2点通过电话获知这一喜讯。

sentences.english: I thought we did well against Blackburn's long-ball threat.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们很好的应对了布莱克本的长传威胁。

sentences.english: Increasingly aware of the prospect emerging from Rovers Academy, Sam Allardyce soon picked Jones.
sentences.chinese: 他在布莱克本越来越出色，大山姆很快就提拔了琼斯。

sentences.english: And that means the Addicks have all to play for according to Pardew, starting at Ewood Park next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着查尔顿将在下周的比赛中力战布莱克本队。

sentences.english: SEEMA: I grew up in a Muslim Asian family in Blackburn.
sentences.chinese: 我在布莱克本的一个亚洲穆斯林教徒家庭中长大的。

sentences.english: A more realistic dream was playing one day at Ewood Park.
sentences.chinese: 当时一个比较现实的梦想是进入布莱克本。

sentences.english: Blackburn boss Sam Allardyce was also keeping a close on eye on the forward's situation.
sentences.chinese: 布莱克本的教练阿勒代斯同样对这名天才密切关注。
布莱克本又和格莱德尔一起发现了端粒酶。
